title: Lyallpur FC
text: Lyallpur Football Club is a Pakistani professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Faisalabad">Faisalabad</a>, <a href="Punjab%2C%20Pakistan">Punjab</a>, Pakistan. The club was founded as University Football Club and changed their name to current before the start of <a href="2014%E2%80%9315%20Pakistan%20Football%20Federation%20League">2014–15 Pakistan Football Federation League</a>.
